about_the_game:
"The Truth" is a psychological horror game where you play as a police officer who is investigating a suspected criminal. You need to solve different puzzles to solve the case. Find out what happened to the family and the suspected criminal. As you delve deeper into the investigation, you begin to realize that things are not as they seem. The truth is elusive, and the more you uncover, the more terrifying the situation becomes. As you uncover the dark secrets of the family and the suspected criminal, you will be forced to confront your own fears and anxieties.

Singleplayer

The Truth features a singleplayer horror experience powered by Unreal Engine 5

Story

Discover secrets and find the truth about the case you are investigating.

Find out what happened and don't die.

Puzzles

The Truth features several puzzles and challenges to solve.

Highly detailed environments

The games features more than one simple house. It features several houses, a huge forest and more.

Checkpoint and save system

You don't need to start over when you close the game. There are many checkpoints that automatically save the game. There are also many save-devices that you can find during your journey.

content_descriptors.notes:
„The Truth“ contains blood and also some rooms or scenes that might be disturbing for some users. 
It contains suicide (only story and not visible)
